department: ACAN is operated by Public Works and Government Services Canada on behalf of Canada Border Services Agency
short_summary: Procurement of services for Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)filename:
description: Services Procurement for Advance Contract Award Notice
full_summary:
===========================================================

## Service Procurement ACAN

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** WS4093765141-Doc4097879057
* **Public Notice Date:** July 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 28, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Contract Start Date:** August 1, 2023
* **Contract End Date:** July 31, 2028

### Tender Details

* **Contract Category:** SRV
* **Procurment Method:** Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* **Procurement Description:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) intends to award a contract to provide rehabilitation services for substance abuse under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contracting Entity

* **Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User Entity

* **Entity Name:** Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
* **Entity Address:** 333 North River Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1L 8B9, Canada

### Contract Contact

* **Name:** Grozdanovski, Tase (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** tase.grozdanovski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Other Information

* **Tender Status:** Expired

Note: The above text was rewritten and rephrased to make it more concise and professional. All relevant information was included while eliminating unnecessary details. The original text was taken from a government tender announcement, which was shared with the expert technical writer. The rewritten entry is suitable for a tender notice document.
